comments:
Build ID: Build id: 1.0.0.200611131

Steps To Reproduce:
The new JDBC connection wizard accessed via the Data Source Explorer View throws NPE when testing a connection with an empty form.

The button should just be inactive until the form has been populated

Steps---
-Right click in the Data Source Explorer view
-Select new
-Select JDBC connection (next)
-Enter something in the first form and click next
-On the JDBC Connection Profile page, click test connection before entering anything in the form
-You will notice the following NPE in the PDE runtime error log


java.lang.NullPointerException
